original_title: Sri Lankan Court Mandates Security Measures for Former CID Chief
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Court of Appeal directed Sri Lankan security authorities to take immediate steps to ensure adequate protection for Shani Abeysekera, the former Director of the Criminal Investigation Department (CID).
The order comes in response to a writ petition filed by Abeysekera, citing concerns over imminent threats to his life.
The petition was heard before a bench comprised of President of the Court of Appeal, Justice Nishanka Bandula Karunaratne and Justice Vikum Kaluarachchi.
